mapper.sql: comprehensive_id, comprehensive_year, task_score, innovation_score_sum, positive_score, performance_score, user_score, expert_score, innovation_score, score_sum, evel_name, comprehensive_status, remark, CREATED_USER, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_USER, UPDATED_TIME, DEL
mapper.select: select a.*,b.unit_name,c.evel_name as evelId from comprehensive_assessment a left join unit_manage b on a.unit_id=b.unit_id left join evaluation_evel c on a.evel_id =c.evel_id

select a.unit_id,b.illustrate,c.assessment_criteria ,d.assessment_year,d.indicators_name from indicator_report a left join score_record b on a.report_id=b.report_id left join assessment_indicators_detail c on c.detail_id=a.detail_id left join assessment_indicators d on d.indicators_id=a.indicators_id where a.unit_id=#{unitId} and d.assessment_year=#{assessmentYear}
